data.eml:eml: Review of the world species of Exoryza (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Microgastrinae), with description of five new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fernandez-Triana, Jose L., Whitfield, James B., Smith, M. Alex, Dapkey, Tanya, Hallwachs, Winnie, Janzen, Daniel H. (2016): Review of the world species of Exoryza (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Microgastrinae), with description of five new species. Deutsche Entomologische Zeitschrift 63 (2): 195-210, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/dez.63.8977, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/dez.63.8977
